titleStmt.title: A letter sent to the General Assembly of the kirke of Scotland: by Oliver Cromwell Lord Generall of the army of the Common-wealth of England now in Scotland &c.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hanna Allen at the signe of the Crown in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
